name: Coffe
title: AMERICA’S FAVORITE CUP
description: Our famous Hot Coffee is made from high-quality Arabica beans and is freshly ground and brewed continually throughout the day.

name: Iced Coffe
title: THE PERFECT PICK-ME-UP
description: Freshly brewed and full of flavor, our Iced Coffee gets you energized and ready to go.

name: cold brew
title: BREWED SLOW. SERVED FAST.
description: Arabica beans steeped overnight in cold water for 12 hours to slowly extract the flavor, making it an ultra-smooth, full bodied cold coffee with a sweeter, rich chocolatey taste. Craft-brewed in small batches. Limited quantities available daily.

name: AMERICANO
title: AWESOME AMERICANOS
description: Our Hot Americano puts the oh! in Americano by combining two shots of Dunkin’s 100% Rainforest Alliance Certified™ espresso with hot water creating a rich, robust drink.

name: ICED AMERICANO
title: AWESOME AMERICANOS
description: Our Iced Americano blends two shots of Dunkin' 100% Rainforest Alliance Certified™ espresso richness with water for a refreshing, espresso-forward cup of woah!

name: LATTE
title: LEGIT LATTES
description: Made with steamed, frothy milk, blended with our rich, freshly ground and brewed espresso. Our Latte has a layer of foam and is the perfect balance of creamy and smooth to get you goin'.

name: ICED LATTE
title: LEGIT LATTES
description: Made with milk blended with our rich, freshly ground and brewed espresso, our Iced Latte has the perfect balance of cool and creamy to get you goin'.

name: SIGNATURE LATTE
title: SIP SIP HOORAY!
description: Made with warm, frothy milk and blended with rich espresso, our handcrafted Signature Lattes add a delicious twist with whipped cream, drizzle and toppings.

name: ICED SIGNATURE LATTE
title: SIP SIP HOORAY!
description: Made with rich espresso & milk, our handcrafted Signature Lattes add a delicious twist with whipped cream, drizzle and toppings

name: MACCHIATO
title: MIGHTY MACCHIATOS
description: Did someone say layers on layers of hand-crafted deliciousness? Made with creamy milk and topped with two shots of espresso, our Macchiato is just what you're looking for.

name: ICED MACCHIATO
title: MIGHTY MACCHIATOS
description: Looking for layers on layers of handcrafted deliciousness? Made with layers of creamy milk and two shots of espresso then served over ice, our Iced Macchiato is just what you need.

name: CAPPUCCINO
title: CLASSIC CAPPUCCINOS
description: Our Cappuccino is a warm cup of blended espresso and frothy, bold deliciousness. Made with high-quality espresso beans, freshly ground, freshly brewed and then blended with steamed milk. This beverage has a thick layer of creamy foam for your delight.

name: ICED CAPPUCCINO
title: CLASSIC CAPPUCCINOS
description: Our Iced Cappuccino is brewed with freshly ground espresso beans and then blended with milk served over ice for a refreshing cup of frothy and bold deliciousness.

name: ESPRESSO
title: ESPRESSOMG
description: Not every bean has what it takes to be a Dunkin' espresso bean. We only roast and grind the finest, high-quality Arabica beans. Every shot of espresso is brewed fresh for every beverage a guest orders. Every sip is balanced with sweet caramel and bittersweet chocolate for a smooth and bold flavor.

name: TEA
title: PREMIUM HOT TEAS AND HERBAL INFUSIONS
description: Pyramid style tea sachets containing high-quality loose leaf teas and a unique blend of herbs to offer guests a delicious cup every time.

name: ICED TEA
title: ALWAYS DELICIOUS. ALWAYS FRESHLY BREWED.
description: Our refreshing, revitalizing teas are freshly brewed in store each day and served over ice.

name: Sausage, Egg & Cheese
title: Sausage, Egg & Cheese
description: A tasty sandwich stacked with egg, American cheese and irresistible sausage.

name: BACON, EGG & CHEESE
title: A BREAKFAST CLASSIC
description: A breakfast classic featuring cherrywood smoked bacon, egg and American cheese.

name: Turkey Sausage, Egg & Cheese
title: A TWIST ON A CLASSIC BREAKFAST FAVORITE
description: Delicious turkey sausage, egg and American cheese.

name: Egg & Cheese
title: SIMPLE MEETS SATISFYING
description: Our Egg and Cheese breakfast sandwich is as simple as it gets, making it the perfect way to get running.

name: Sourdough Breakfast Sandwich
title: A BREAKFAST CLASSIC
description: Two eggs, five half slices of bacon and white cheddar on two pieces of sourdough toast.

name: Wake-Up Wrap®
title: UNWRAP PERFECTION
description: Our delicious Wake-Up Wrap® Sandwiches are made-to-order with your choice of protein, egg and cheese. The perfect portion to help start your day or fuel your afternoon.

name: Hash Browns
title: HEAVEN TOASTED
description: Our hash browns are lightly seasoned and golden brown for maximum goodness. Delicious on their own or paired with a sandwich.

name: Stuffed Bagel Minis
title: THE PERFECT SNACK
description: Try our Plain and Everything Stuffed Bagel Minis filled with cream cheese, served warm.

name: Snackin' Bacon
title: EVERYONE'S BETTER WITH BACON
description: Enjoy crispy seasoned bacon.

name: Bagels with Cream Cheese Spread
title: A DELICIOUS WAY TO START YOUR DAY
description: A delicious bagel with your favorite cream cheese spread. Enjoy with your favorite morning coffee!

name: Muffins
title: A GO-TO CLASSIC
description: Enjoy a delicious muffin with your favorite coffee from Dunkin'.

name: CROISSANT
title: FRESHLY BAKED DELICIOUS
description: A delicious way to start your day. Our warm, freshly baked croissant is the perfect pair to a freshly brewed Hot or Iced Coffee.

name: ENGLISH MUFFIN
title: FRESHLY BAKED DELICIOUS
description: Enjoy a classic morning favorite. Our oven-toasted english muffin goes great with your favorite spread.

name: Donuts
title: MAKING PEOPLE SMILE SINCE 1950
description: Our delicious donuts come in a variety of flavors, so there’s a favorite for everyone.
flavor: Strawberry Frosted with Halloween Sprinkles Donut
Vanilla Frosted with Halloween Sprinkles Donut
Chocolate Frosted with Halloween Sprinkles Donut

name: MUNCHKINS® Donut Hole Treats
title: SHAREABLE, SNACKABLE PERFECTION
description: Everyone loves our MUNCHKINS® Donut Hole Treats. They’re made in a variety of delicious flavors, so it’s easy to try them all.
flavor: Strawberry Frosted with Halloween Sprinkles Donut
Vanilla Frosted with Halloween Sprinkles Donut
Chocolate Frosted with Halloween Sprinkles Donut
